trans-unit.source: Displays a hierarchical collection of labeled items, each represented by a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Exibe uma coleção hierárquica de itens rotulados, cada representados por um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Nodes%2A> collection holds all the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> objects that are assigned to the TreeView control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Nodes%2A>coleção contém todos os <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>objetos que são atribuídos ao controle TreeView.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Nodes%2A>

trans-unit.source: The tree nodes in this collection are referred to as the root tree nodes.
trans-unit.target: Os nós de árvore na coleção são chamados de nós da árvore de raiz.

trans-unit.source: Any tree node that is subsequently added to a root tree node is referred to as a child node.
trans-unit.target: Qualquer nó de árvore que é subsequentemente adicionado a um nó raiz da árvore é conhecido como um nó filho.

trans-unit.source: Because each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> can contain a collection of other <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> objects, you might find it difficult to determine your location in the tree structure when you iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: Como cada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>pode conter uma coleção de outros <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>objetos, talvez seja difícil determinar seu local na estrutura de árvore quando iterar pela coleção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: You can parse the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.FullPath%2A?displayProperty=fullName> string by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.PathSeparator%2A> string value to determine where a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> label begins and ends.
trans-unit.target: Você pode analisar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.FullPath%2A?displayProperty=fullName>cadeia de caracteres usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.PathSeparator%2A>string valor para determinar onde um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>rótulo começa e termina.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.PathSeparator%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.FullPath%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can display images next to the tree nodes by assigning an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A> property and referencing the index value of an <xref:System.Drawing.Image> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> to assign that <xref:System.Drawing.Image>.
trans-unit.target: Você pode exibir imagens ao lado de nós de árvore, atribuindo um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A>propriedade e referenciando o valor de índice de um <xref:System.Drawing.Image>a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>atribuir esse <xref:System.Drawing.Image>.</xref:System.Drawing.Image> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> </xref:System.Drawing.Image> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>

trans-unit.source: Use the following properties to assign images: - Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A> property to the index value of the <xref:System.Drawing.Image> that you want to display when a tree node is not selected.
trans-unit.target: Use as propriedades a seguir para atribuir imagens: - defina a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>propriedade para o valor de índice a <xref:System.Drawing.Image>que você deseja exibir quando um nó de árvore não está selecionado.</xref:System.Drawing.Image> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> property to the index value of the <xref:System.Drawing.Image> that you want to display when a tree node is selected.
trans-unit.target: -Definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>propriedade para o valor de índice a <xref:System.Drawing.Image>que você deseja exibir quando um nó de árvore é selecionado.</xref:System.Drawing.Image> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The images referenced by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> property values are the default images displayed by all the tree nodes that are assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Nodes%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: As imagens referenciadas pela <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>valores de propriedade são imagens padrão exibidas por todos os nós de árvore que são atribuídos para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Nodes%2A>coleção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Nodes%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: Individual tree nodes can override the default images by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.SelectedImageIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties.
trans-unit.target: Nós de árvore individual podem substituir as imagens padrão definindo a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.SelectedImageIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.SelectedImageIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The state images displayed in the TreeView are 16 x 16 pixels by default.
trans-unit.target: As imagens de estado exibidas em TreeView são 16x16 pixels por padrão.

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A> will have no effect on how the images are displayed.
trans-unit.target: Definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A>não tem efeito sobre como as imagens são exibidas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, the state images are resized according to the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ``` Tree nodes can be expanded to display the next level of child tree nodes.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, as imagens de estado são redimensionadas acordo com a configuração de DPI do sistema quando o arquivo App. config contém a seguinte entrada: ``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ``` nós de árvore podem ser expandidos para exibir o próximo nível filho de nós de árvore.

trans-unit.source: The user can expand the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> by clicking the plus-sign (+) button, if one is displayed next to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>, or you can expand the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Expand%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: O usuário pode expandir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>clicando no botão de sinal de adição (+), caso seja exibida ao lado de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>, ou você pode expandir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>chamando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Expand%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Expand%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: To expand all the child tree node levels in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A> collection, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ExpandAll%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para expandir todos os filhos árvore nó níveis no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A>coleção, chame o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ExpandAll%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ExpandAll%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can collapse the child <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> level by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Collapse%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, or the user can press the minus-sign (-) button, if one is displayed next to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.
trans-unit.target: Você pode recolher filho de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>nível chamando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Collapse%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método, ou o usuário pode pressionar o botão de sinal de subtração (-), caso seja exibida ao lado de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Collapse%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: You can also call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Toggle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to alternate between the expanded and collapsed states.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Toggle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método para alternar entre os estados expandidos e recolhidos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Toggle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Tree nodes can optionally display check boxes.
trans-unit.target: Nós de árvore, opcionalmente, podem exibir caixas de seleção.

trans-unit.source: To display the check boxes, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A> property of the TreeView to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para exibir as caixas de seleção, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A>propriedade de TreeView para `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A> property is set to `true` for tree nodes that are in a checked state.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A>está definida como `true` para nós de árvore que estão em um estado selecionado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property from within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeforeCheck> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterCheck> event causes the event to be raised multiple times and can result in unexpected behavior.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Configuração o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade de dentro do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeforeCheck>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterCheck>evento faz com que o evento a ser gerado várias vezes e pode resultar em comportamento inesperado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterCheck> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeforeCheck> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For example, you might set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A> property in the event handler when you are recursively updating the child nodes so that the user does not have to expand and check each one individually.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A>propriedade no manipulador de eventos quando você estiver recursivamente atualizar os nós filho para que o usuário não precise expandir e verifique se cada um deles individualmente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A>

trans-unit.source: To prevent the event from being raised multiple times, add logic to your event handler that only executes your recursive code if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs.Action%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs> is not set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAction?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Para impedir que o evento que está sendo gerado várias vezes, adicionar lógica para o manipulador de eventos que executa o código recursivo somente se a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs.Action%2A>propriedade do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs>não está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAction?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAction?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs.Action%2A>

trans-unit.source: For an example of how to do this, see the Example section of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterCheck> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeforeCheck> events.
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo de como fazer isso, consulte a seção exemplo de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterCheck>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeforeCheck>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeforeCheck> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterCheck>

trans-unit.source: You can change the appearance of the TreeView control by setting some of its display and style properties.
trans-unit.target: Você pode alterar a aparência do controle TreeView definindo algumas de suas propriedades de exibição e estilo.

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowPlusMinus%2A> to `true` displays a plus-sign or minus-sign button next to each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> that can be expanded or collapsed, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Definindo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowPlusMinus%2A>para `true` exibe um botão de sinal de adição ou sinal de subtração ao lado de cada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>que podem ser expandidas ou recolhidas, respectivamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowPlusMinus%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowRootLines%2A> property to `true` causes the TreeView to display lines that join all the root tree nodes together.
trans-unit.target: Definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowRootLines%2A>propriedade `true` faz com que o modo de exibição de árvore exibir linhas que reúnam todos os nós de árvore de raiz.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowRootLines%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can display lines that connect child tree nodes to their root node by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowLines%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Você pode exibir linhas que conectam os nós de árvore filho para o nó raiz, definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowLines%2A>propriedade `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowLines%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.HotTracking%2A> property to `true` changes the appearance of the tree node labels as the mouse pointer passes over them.
trans-unit.target: Definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.HotTracking%2A>propriedade `true` alterações a aparência dos rótulos de nó de árvore quando o ponteiro do mouse passa sobre eles.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.HotTracking%2A>

trans-unit.source: When hot-tracked, the tree node labels take on the appearance of a hyperlink.
trans-unit.target: Quando hot-rastreadas, os rótulos de nó de árvore assumem a aparência de um hiperlink.

trans-unit.source: You can also completely customize the appearance of the TreeView control.
trans-unit.target: Também completamente, você pode personalizar a aparência do controle TreeView.

trans-unit.source: To do this, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A> property to a value other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName> and handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode> event.
trans-unit.target: Para fazer isso, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A>propriedade com um valor diferente de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName>e tratar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Scrollable%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> properties at run time, the TreeView handle is recreated (see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>) to update the control's appearance.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Ao definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Scrollable%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>Propriedades em tempo de execução, o identificador de TreeView é recriado (consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>) para atualizar a aparência do controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Scrollable%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A>

trans-unit.source: This causes all tree nodes to be collapsed, except for the selected <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.
trans-unit.target: Isso faz com que todos os nós de árvore a ser recolhido, exceto a selecionada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the tree node check box is checked.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre depois que a caixa de seleção do nó de árvore é marcada.

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property from within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeforeCheck> or AfterCheck event handler causes the event to be raised multiple times and can result in unexpected behavior.
trans-unit.target: Definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade de dentro um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeforeCheck>ou manipulador de eventos do evento AfterCheck faz com que o evento a ser gerado várias vezes e pode resultar em comportamento inesperado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeforeCheck> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To prevent the event from being raised multiple times, add logic to your event handler that only executes your recursive code if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs.Action%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs> is not set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAction?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Para impedir que o evento que está sendo gerado várias vezes, adicionar lógica para o manipulador de eventos que executa o código recursivo somente se a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs.Action%2A>propriedade do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs>não está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAction?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAction?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs.Action%2A>

trans-unit.target: O padrão é o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultBackColor*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultBackColor*>

trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the tree node check box is checked.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre antes que a caixa de seleção do nó de árvore é marcada.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property from within the BeforeCheck or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterCheck> event causes the event to be raised multiple times and can result in unexpected behavior.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE]> Definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade a partir da BeforeCheck ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterCheck>evento faz com que o evento a ser gerado várias vezes e pode resultar em comportamento inesperado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterCheck> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For example, you might set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A> property in the event handler when you are recursively updating the child nodes, so that the user does not have to expand and check each one individually.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A>propriedade no manipulador de eventos quando você estiver recursivamente atualizar os nós filho, para que o usuário não precise expandir e verifique se cada um deles individualmente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A>

trans-unit.source: To prevent the event from being raised multiple times, add logic to your event handler that only executes your recursive code if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs.Action%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs> is not set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAction?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Para impedir que o evento que está sendo gerado várias vezes, adicionar lógica para o manipulador de eventos que executa o código recursivo somente se a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs.Action%2A>propriedade do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs>não está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAction?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAction?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs.Action%2A>

trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como manipular eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Disables any redrawing of the tree view.
trans-unit.target: Desabilita qualquer redesenho da exibição de árvore.

trans-unit.source: To maintain performance while items are added one at a time to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>, call the BeginUpdate method.
trans-unit.target: Para manter o desempenho enquanto os itens são adicionados um por vez para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>, chame o método BeginUpdate.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: The BeginUpdate method prevents the control from painting until the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.EndUpdate%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: O método BeginUpdate impede que o controle de pintura até que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.EndUpdate%2A>método é chamado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.EndUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The preferred way to add items to a tree view control is to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection.AddRange%2A> method to add an array of tree node items to a tree view.
trans-unit.target: A melhor maneira de adicionar itens a um controle de exibição de árvore é usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection.AddRange%2A>para adicionar uma matriz de itens do nó de árvore para uma exibição de árvore.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection.AddRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, if you want to add items one at a time, use the BeginUpdate method to prevent the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control from painting during the add operations.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, se você quiser adicionar um item por vez, use o método de BeginUpdate para evitar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>controle de pintura durante as operações de adicionar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: To allow the control to resume painting, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.EndUpdate%2A> method when all the tree nodes have been added to the tree view.
trans-unit.target: Para permitir que o controle retomar a pintura, chame o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.EndUpdate%2A>método quando todos os nós de árvore foram adicionados para o modo de exibição de árvore.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.EndUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style of the tree view control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o estilo da borda do controle de exibição de árvore.

trans-unit.source: When the BorderStyle property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> has a sunken, three-dimensional appearance.
trans-unit.target: Quando a propriedade BorderStyle é definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle>, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>tem uma aparência em baixo-relevo, tridimensional.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle>

trans-unit.source: To display a flat, thin border around the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle>.
trans-unit.target: Para exibir uma borda fina simples ao redor do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>controle, defina a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle>propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: O valor atribuído não é um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether check boxes are displayed next to the tree nodes in the tree view control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se caixas de seleção são exibidas ao lado de nós de árvore no controle de exibição de árvore.

trans-unit.source: A check box is displayed to the left of both the tree node label and tree node <xref:System.Drawing.Image>, if any.
trans-unit.target: É exibida uma caixa de seleção à esquerda do rótulo do nó de árvore e no nó de árvore <xref:System.Drawing.Image>, se houver.</xref:System.Drawing.Image>

trans-unit.source: Check boxes allow the user to select more than one tree node at a time.
trans-unit.target: Caixas de seleção Permitir que o usuário selecionar mais de um nó de árvore de cada vez.

trans-unit.source: When the CheckBoxes property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> is set to `true`, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A> property is set, each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> that is contained in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> displays the first and second images from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A> to indicate an unchecked or checked state, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Quando a propriedade de caixas de seleção de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>é definido como `true`e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A>propriedade for definida, cada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>que está contida no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>exibe as imagens de primeira e segunda do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A>para indicar um estado marcado ou desmarcado, respectivamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: However, the displayed images may be different if the following situation occurs: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> of the node is set to a value other than 0 or 1, and the CheckBoxes property of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> is set to `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> will not automatically reset to -1 to indicate it is not set.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, as imagens exibidas podem ser diferentes se ocorre a seguinte situação: se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>do nó é definido como um valor diferente de 0 ou 1 e a propriedade de caixas de seleção do pai <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>é definido como `false`, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>não será automaticamente redefinido como -1 para indicar que não está definido.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the state image at the indicated index position is shown.
trans-unit.target: Nesse caso, é mostrada a imagem do estado na posição de índice indicado.

trans-unit.source: If CheckBoxes is set to `true` again, the first and second images of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A> are shown to indicate a checked or unchecked state, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Se as caixas de seleção é definida como `true` novamente, as imagens de primeira e segunda do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A>são mostradas para indicar um estado marcado ou desmarcado, respectivamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When setting the CheckBoxes property at run time, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> handle is recreated (see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>) to update the control's appearance.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Ao definir a propriedade de caixas de seleção em tempo de execução, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>identificador é recriado (consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>) para atualizar a aparência do controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: This causes all tree nodes to be collapsed, with the exception of the selected <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.
trans-unit.target: Isso faz com que todos os nós de árvore a ser recolhido, com exceção de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> selecionado

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a check box is displayed next to each tree node in the tree view control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se for exibida uma caixa de seleção ao lado de cada nó de árvore no controle de exibição de árvore; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Collapses all the tree nodes.
trans-unit.target: Recolhe todos os nós de árvore.

trans-unit.source: The CollapseAll method collapses all the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> objects, which includes all the child tree nodes, that are in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: O método Recolher toda recolhe todos os <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>objetos, que inclui todos os nós de árvore filho, o que estão no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The state of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> persists.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O estado de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>persistir.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose that you call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Expand%2A> method for a root tree node.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, suponha que você chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Expand%2A>método para um nó raiz da árvore.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Expand%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the child tree nodes were not previously collapsed, they will appear in their previously-expanded state.
trans-unit.target: Se os nós de árvore filho não foram recolhidos anteriormente, elas aparecerão em seu estado previamente expandidos.

trans-unit.source: Calling the CollapseAll method ensures that all the tree nodes appear in the collapsed state.
trans-unit.target: Chamar a recolher toda o método garante que todos os nós de árvore exibida no estado recolhido.

trans-unit.target: Cria um identificador para o controle.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos não gerenciados usados pelo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"> </xref> e, opcionalmente, libera os recursos gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo público `Dispose` método e o <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>método.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose`invoca o protegido `Dispose(Boolean)` método com o `disposing` parâmetro definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>invoca `Dispose` com `disposing` definido como `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `disposing` parâmetro for true, este método libera todos os recursos mantidos por qualquer objeto gerenciado que este <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>referências.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Este método chama o `Dispose` método de cada objeto referenciado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para liberar recursos gerenciados e não gerenciados; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para liberar apenas recursos não gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control should redraw its surface using a secondary buffer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o controle deve redesenhar sua superfície usando um buffer secundário.

trans-unit.source: The DoubleBuffered property does not affect the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade DoubleBuffered não afeta o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: Setting the DoubleBuffered property does not affect the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: Definir o DoubleBuffered propriedade não afeta a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: If you want to reduce flicker when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> is drawn, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.EndUpdate%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Se você deseja reduzir a cintilação quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>é desenhada, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.EndUpdate%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.EndUpdate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control uses a secondary buffer; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o controle usa um buffer secundário; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the mode in which the control is drawn.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o modo no qual o controle é desenhado.

trans-unit.source: The nodes of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> are typically drawn by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: Os nós de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>normalmente são desenhadas pelo sistema operacional.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: The DrawMode property lets you customize the appearance of the nodes.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade DrawMode permite que você personalize a aparência de nós.

trans-unit.source: To do this, set DrawMode to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName> and provide a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode> event.
trans-unit.target: Para fazer isso, defina DrawMode <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName>e fornecer um manipulador para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This is called owner drawing.
trans-unit.target: Isso é chamado de desenho do proprietário.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The property value is not a valid <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade não é válido <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode"> </xref> valor.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> is drawn and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode*> property is set to a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode"></xref> value other than <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"> </xref> é desenhada e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode*>está definida como um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode"> </xref> valor diferente de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode*>

trans-unit.source: Use this event to customize the appearance of nodes in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control using owner drawing.
trans-unit.target: Use este evento para personalizar a aparência de nós em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>controle usando o desenho do proprietário.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode> values of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento é gerado apenas quando a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A>propriedade é definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>valores <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table indicates how the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> can be customized when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A> property is set to these values.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir indica como o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>pode ser personalizada quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A>estiver definida como esses valores.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: |DrawMode property value|TreeNode customization| |-----------------------------|----------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>|The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> label area can be customized.
trans-unit.target: | O valor da propriedade DrawMode | Personalização de TreeNode | |-----------------------------|----------------------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>| O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>área rótulo pode ser personalizada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>

trans-unit.source: All other <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> elements are drawn automatically.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>|The appearance of the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> can be customized.
trans-unit.target: Todos os outros elementos de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>são desenhados automaticamente. | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>| A aparência de todo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>pode ser personalizado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: Icons, check boxes, plus and minus signs, and lines connecting the nodes must be drawn manually if they are desired.| The region that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value would occupy if it were drawn using the font specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A> property is the region in which a node can be clicked to select it.
trans-unit.target: Ícones, caixas de verificação, adição e subtração sinais e linhas que conectam os nós devem ser definidas manualmente, se eles forem desejados. | A região que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>valor seria ocupam se ela foi desenhada usando a fonte especificada, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A>propriedade é a região em que um nó pode ser clicado para selecionar um proprietário. da controle</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This is called the hit test region.
trans-unit.target: Isso é chamado de região de teste de clique.

trans-unit.source: If you draw outside this region, you should provide your own code that selects a node when its visible area is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Se você desenhar esta região, você deve fornecer seu próprio código que seleciona um nó quando a área visível é clicada.

trans-unit.source: The hit test region corresponds to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Bounds%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property when using <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>.
trans-unit.target: A região de teste de hit corresponde à <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Bounds%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade ao usar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Bounds%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When using <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>, however, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Bounds%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property encompasses the entire width of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>.
trans-unit.target: Ao usar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>, no entanto, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Bounds%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade abrange toda a largura de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Bounds%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>

trans-unit.source: In this case, you can access the hit test region by getting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Node%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value and accessing its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Bounds%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Nesse caso, você pode acessar a região de teste de clique Obtendo a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Node%2A?displayProperty=fullName>valor e acessar seu <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Bounds%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Bounds%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Node%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can then draw the hit test region of the node within these bounds, or you can provide your own hit test code.
trans-unit.target: É possível desenhar a região de teste de clique do nó dentro desses limites, ou você pode fornecer seu próprio código de teste de clique.

trans-unit.source: Note that setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.NodeFont%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property does not change the size of the hit test region, which is calculated using the font specified for the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>.
trans-unit.target: Observe que a configuração de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.NodeFont%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade não altera o tamanho da região de teste de clique, que é calculado usando a fonte especificada para toda a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.NodeFont%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como manipular eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Enables the redrawing of the tree view.
trans-unit.target: Permite que o redesenho da exibição de árvore.

trans-unit.source: To maintain performance while items are added one at a time to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para manter o desempenho enquanto os itens são adicionados um por vez para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>, chame o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A> method prevents the control from painting until the EndUpdate method is called.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A>método impede que o controle até que o método EndUpdate é chamado de pintura.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The preferred way to add items to a tree view control is to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection.AddRange%2A> method to add an array of tree node items to a tree view.
trans-unit.target: A melhor maneira de adicionar itens a um controle de exibição de árvore é usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection.AddRange%2A>para adicionar uma matriz de itens do nó de árvore para uma exibição de árvore.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection.AddRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, if you want to add items one at a time, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A> method to prevent the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control from painting during the add operations.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, se você deseja adicionar um item por vez, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A>método para impedir que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>controle de pintura durante as operações de adicionar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: To allow control the control to resume painting, call the EndUpdate method when all the tree nodes have been added to the tree view.
trans-unit.target: Para permitir o controle retomar a pintura de controle, chame o método de EndUpdate quando todos os nós de árvore são adicionados à exibição de árvore.

trans-unit.source: Expands all the tree nodes.
trans-unit.target: Expande todos os nós de árvore.

trans-unit.source: The ExpandAll method expands all the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> objects, which includes all the child tree nodes, that are in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: O método expandir toda expande todas as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>objetos, que inclui todos os nós de árvore filho, o que estão no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The state of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> persists.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O estado de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>persistir.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose that you call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ExpandAll%2A> method, and then the individual root tree nodes are collapsed.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, suponha que você chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ExpandAll%2A>método e, em seguida, os nós de árvore de raiz individuais são recolhidas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ExpandAll%2A>

trans-unit.source: The child tree nodes have not been collapsed, and will appear in their previously-expanded state when the root tree nodes are expanded again.
trans-unit.target: Os nós de árvore filho não foram recolhidos e aparecerão em seu estado expandido anteriormente quando os nós de árvore de raiz são expandidos novamente.

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CollapseAll%2A> method ensures that all the tree nodes appear in the collapsed state.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CollapseAll%2A>método garante que todos os nós de árvore aparecerão no estado recolhido.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CollapseAll%2A>

trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cor de primeiro plano do controle.

trans-unit.target: O primeiro plano <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> do controle.

trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o realce de seleção ocupa a largura do controle de exibição de árvore.

trans-unit.source: When FullRowSelect is `true`, a selection highlight spans the entire width of the tree view, display instead of the width of just the tree node label.
trans-unit.target: Quando for FullRowSelect `true`, realce uma seleção abrange toda a largura da exibição de árvore, exibir, em vez da largura do somente o rótulo do nó de árvore.

trans-unit.source: The FullRowSelect property is ignored if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowLines%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade FullRowSelect será ignorada se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowLines%2A>for definido como `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowLines%2A>

trans-unit.target: Recupera o nó de árvore que está no ponto especificado.

trans-unit.target: Recupera o nó de árvore no ponto com as coordenadas especificadas.

trans-unit.source: You can pass the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs.X%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs.Y%2A?displayProperty=fullName> coordinates of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> event as the `x` and `y` parameters.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the number of tree nodes, optionally including those in all subtrees, assigned to the tree view control.
trans-unit.target: Recupera o número de nós de árvore, opcionalmente, incluindo aqueles em todas as subárvores, atribuídas ao controle de exibição de árvore.

trans-unit.source: If `includeSubTrees` is `true`, the result is the number of all the tree nodes in the entire tree structure.
trans-unit.target: Se `includeSubTrees` é `true`, o resultado é o número de todos os nós de árvore na estrutura de árvore inteira.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to count the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> items that the subtrees contain; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para contar o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> itens que contêm as subárvores; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The number of tree nodes, optionally including those in all subtrees, assigned to the tree view control.
trans-unit.target: O número de nós de árvore, opcionalmente, incluindo aqueles em todas as subárvores, atribuídas ao controle de exibição de árvore.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the selected tree node remains highlighted even when the tree view has lost the focus.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o nó de árvore selecionado permanece realçado mesmo quando o modo de exibição de árvore perdeu o foco.

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `false`, selected nodes in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control remain highlighted in a different color than the current selection color when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control loses focus.
trans-unit.target: Quando essa propriedade é definida como `false`, nós em selecionados a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>controle permanece realçado em uma cor diferente da seleção atual cor quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>controle perde o foco.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to keep items that are selected by the user visible when the user clicks a different control on the form or moves to a different window.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar essa propriedade para manter os itens que são selecionados pelo usuário visível quando o usuário clica em um controle diferente no formulário ou move para uma janela diferente.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you are concerned with the accessibility of your applications, it is recommended that you set the HideSelection property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se você estiver preocupado com a acessibilidade de seus aplicativos, é recomendável que você definir a propriedade HideSelection `false`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the selected tree node is not highlighted when the tree view has lost the focus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o nó de árvore selecionado não é realçado quando o modo de exibição de árvore perdeu o foco. Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Fornece informações de nó, dado um ponto.

trans-unit.target: Use esse método para determinar se um ponto está localizado em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>e a localização dentro do nó do ponto, como na área de rótulo ou a imagem.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.target: As informações do nó.

trans-unit.target: Fornece informações de nó, considerando as coordenadas x e y.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to determine whether a set of x- and y-coordinates is located in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> and where within the node the point is located, such as on the label or image area.
trans-unit.target: Use esse método para determinar se um conjunto de coordenadas x e y-está localizado em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>e a localização dentro do nó do ponto, como na área de rótulo ou a imagem.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.target: A coordenada y no qual recuperar informações do nó.

trans-unit.source: The node information.
trans-unit.target: As informações do nó.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a tree node label takes on the appearance of a hyperlink as the mouse pointer passes over it.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica que se um rótulo de nó de árvore assume a aparência de um hiperlink como o ponteiro do mouse passa sobre ele.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A> property is set to `true`, the HotTracking property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A>está definida como `true`, a propriedade HotTracking não tem nenhum efeito.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When the HotTracking property is set to `true`, each tree node label takes on the appearance of a hyperlink as the mouse pointer passes over it.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Quando HotTracking a propriedade é definida como `true`, cada árvore nó rótulo assume a aparência de um hiperlink que o ponteiro do mouse passa sobre ele.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.FontStyle> font style is applied to the <xref:System.Drawing.Font> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> is set to blue to make the label appear as a link.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.FontStyle>estilo de fonte é aplicado para o <xref:System.Drawing.Font>e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>é definido como azul para fazer com que o rótulo exibido como um link.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Font> </xref:System.Drawing.FontStyle>

trans-unit.source: The appearance is not controlled by the Internet settings of the user's operating system.
trans-unit.target: A aparência não é controlada pelas configurações de Internet do sistema operacional do usuário.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a tree node label takes on the appearance of a hyperlink as the mouse pointer passes over it; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se um rótulo de nó de árvore assume a aparência de um hiperlink como o ponteiro do mouse passa sobre ele; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image-list index value of the default image that is displayed by the tree nodes.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor de índice de lista de imagens da imagem padrão que é exibido, os nós de árvore.

trans-unit.source: The ImageIndex value is the index of an <xref:System.Drawing.Image> stored in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O valor ImageIndex é o índice de um <xref:System.Drawing.Image>armazenados no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>atribuído para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> </xref:System.Drawing.Image>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageKey%2A> and ImageIndex properties are mutually exclusive; if one is set, the other is ignored.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageKey%2A>e ImageIndex propriedades são mutuamente exclusivas; se um for definido, a outra será ignorada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageKey%2A>, ImageIndex is automatically set to -1.
trans-unit.target: Se você definir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageKey%2A>, ImageIndex é automaticamente definido como -1.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, if you set ImageIndex, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageKey%2A> is automatically set to an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Como alternativa, se você definir ImageIndex, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageKey%2A>é definida automaticamente como uma cadeia de caracteres vazia ("").</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When setting the ImageIndex property at run time, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> handle is recreated (see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>) to update the control's appearance.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Ao definir a propriedade ImageIndex em tempo de execução, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>identificador é recriado (consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>) para atualizar a aparência do controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: This causes all tree nodes to be collapsed, with the exception of the selected <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.
trans-unit.target: Isso faz com que todos os nós de árvore a ser recolhido, com exceção de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> selecionado

trans-unit.source: A zero-based index that represents the position of an <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> in an <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um índice de base zero que representa a posição de um <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> em uma <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is zero.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é zero.

trans-unit.source: The specified index is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: O índice especificado é menor que 0.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the key of the default image for each node in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> control when it is in an unselected state.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a chave da imagem padrão para cada nó de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"> </xref> controlar quando ele está em um estado desmarcado.

trans-unit.source: The ImageKey property is case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade ImageKey diferencia maiusculas de minúsculas.

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> does not have an image set, the image specified by the ImageKey property will be shown when the node is not selected.
trans-unit.target: Se um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>não tem uma imagem definida, a imagem especificada pelo ImageKey propriedade será mostrada quando o nó não está selecionado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: When the node is selected, the first item in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> will be shown.
trans-unit.target: Quando o nó é selecionado, o primeiro item a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>será mostrado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>

trans-unit.source: The ImageKey and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A> properties are mutually exclusive, meaning if one is set, the other is ignored.
trans-unit.target: ImageKey e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>propriedades são mutuamente exclusivas, que significa que se um for definido, a outra será ignorada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set the ImageKey property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A> property is automatically set to -1.
trans-unit.target: Se você definir a propriedade ImageKey, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>propriedade é definida automaticamente como -1.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, if you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A> property, the ImageKey is automatically set to an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Como alternativa, se você definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>propriedade ImageKey é definido automaticamente como uma cadeia de caracteres vazia ("").</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The key of the default image shown for each node <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> control when the node is in an unselected state.
trans-unit.target: A chave da imagem padrão mostrada para cada nó <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"> </xref> controlar quando o nó está em um estado desmarcado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref> that contains the <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> objects that are used by the tree nodes.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"> </xref> que contém o <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> objetos que são usados por nós de árvore.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> property value is anything other than `null`, all the tree nodes display the first <xref:System.Drawing.Image> stored in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>o valor da propriedade for algo diferente de `null`, todos os nós de árvore exibem a primeira <xref:System.Drawing.Image>armazenados em <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> </xref:System.Drawing.Image> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>

trans-unit.source: You can specify which images from the list are displayed for selected and unselected nodes by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Você pode especificar quais imagens da lista são exibidas para os nós selecionados e desmarcados, definindo a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: Individual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> objects can specify which image is displayed by setting their <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.SelectedImageIndex%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Individuais <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>objetos podem especificar qual imagem é exibida, definindo suas <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageIndex%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.SelectedImageIndex%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.SelectedImageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: These individual settings will override the settings in the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> properties.
trans-unit.target: Essas configurações individuais substituirão as configurações correspondentes <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In the .NET Framework version 1.1, there is an issue that prevents images from appearing on <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> nodes when your application calls <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > No .NET Framework versão 1.1, há um problema que impede que as imagens que aparecem em <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>nós quando o aplicativo chama <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: To work around this issue, call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.DoEvents%2A?displayProperty=fullName> in your `Main` method immediately after you call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para contornar esse problema, chame <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.DoEvents%2A?displayProperty=fullName>no seu `Main` método imediatamente depois de chamar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.DoEvents%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This issue is fixed in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/add/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Esse problema é corrigido no [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/add/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref> that contains the <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> objects that are used by the tree nodes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"> </xref> que contém o <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> objetos que são usados por nós de árvore.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the distance to indent each child tree node level.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a distância de recuo de cada filho de nível de nó de árvore.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to a value of -1 does not throw an exception if the value has not yet been changed from its default.
trans-unit.target: Definir essa propriedade como um valor de -1 não lançará uma exceção se o valor ainda não tiver sido alterado do padrão.

trans-unit.source: This is because the control uses a value of -1 as an internal default before the control handle has been created.
trans-unit.target: Isso ocorre porque o controle usa um valor de -1 como um padrão interno antes que a alça de controle foi criada.

trans-unit.source: This internal default value causes the wrapped control to return its own default value of 19.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão interno faz com que o controle encapsulado retornar o seu próprio valor padrão de 19.

trans-unit.source: The distance, in pixels, to indent each child tree node level.
trans-unit.target: A distância, em pixels, recuo de cada nível de nó de árvore filho.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 19.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é 19.

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is less than 0 (see Remarks).
trans-unit.target: O valor atribuído é menor que 0 (consulte comentários).

trans-unit.source: -or- The assigned value is greater than 32,000.
trans-unit.target: - ou - o valor atribuído é maior do que 32.000.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified key is a regular input key or a special key that requires preprocessing.
trans-unit.target: Determina se a chave especificada é uma chave de entrada regular ou uma chave especial que requer pré-processamento.

trans-unit.source: If the user is editing a tree node, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control treats keys such as ENTER, ESC, HOME, and END as input keys.
trans-unit.target: Se o usuário estiver editando um nó de árvore, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>controle trata as chaves como ENTER, ESC, HOME e END como chaves de entrada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: One of the Keys values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de chaves.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified key is a regular input key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a chave especificada é uma chave de entrada normal; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user begins dragging a node.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o usuário começa a arrastar um nó.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height of each tree node in the tree view control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a altura de cada nó de árvore no controle de exibição de árvore.

trans-unit.source: If the item height is set to a value larger than the height of the tree view control, calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.EnsureVisible%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method will have unexpected results.
trans-unit.target: Se a altura do item é definida como um valor maior que a altura do controle de exibição de árvore, chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.EnsureVisible%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método terão resultados inesperados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.EnsureVisible%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of each tree node in the tree view.
trans-unit.target: A altura, em pixels, de cada nó de árvore na exibição de árvore.

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is less than one.
trans-unit.target: O valor atribuído será menor que&1;.

trans-unit.source: -or- The assigned value is greater than the <xref:System.Int16.MaxValue> value.
trans-unit.target: - ou - o valor atribuído é maior que o <xref:System.Int16.MaxValue>valor.</xref:System.Int16.MaxValue>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the label text of the tree nodes can be edited.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o texto do rótulo de nós de árvore pode ser editado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.BeginEdit%2A> method works only if the LabelEdit property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.BeginEdit%2A>método só funcionará se a propriedade LabelEdit é `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.BeginEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: If LabelEdit is `false` when you attempt to edit the label, an exception will be thrown and the tree node will not be put in to an editable state.
trans-unit.target: Se for LabelEdit `false` quando você tentar editar o rótulo, uma exceção será lançada e o nó de árvore não será colocado em um estado editável.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the label text of the tree nodes can be edited; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o texto do rótulo de nós de árvore pode ser editado; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of the lines connecting the nodes of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cor das linhas que conectam os nós do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> of the lines connecting the tree nodes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> das linhas que conectam os nós de árvore.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user clicks a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o usuário clica em um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> com o mouse.

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when the user clicks any part of a tree node with the mouse, including the plus sign (**+**) or minus sign (**-**) that indicates whether the node is collapsed or expanded.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento ocorre quando o usuário clica em qualquer parte de um nó de árvore com o mouse, incluindo o sinal de adição (**+**) ou sinal de subtração (**-**) que indica se o nó é recolhido ou expandido.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como manipular eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o usuário clica duas vezes em um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> com o mouse.

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when the user double-clicks any part of a tree node with the mouse, including the plus sign (+) or minus sign (-) that indicates whether the node is collapsed or expanded.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento ocorre quando o usuário clica duas vezes em qualquer parte de um nó de árvore com o mouse, incluindo o sinal de adição (+) ou sinal de menos (-) que indica se o nó é recolhido ou expandido.

trans-unit.source: If the mouse is located over a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>, the NodeMouseHover event will occur before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover> event.
trans-unit.target: Se o mouse estiver localizado em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>, o evento NodeMouseHover ocorrerá antes do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>
